content: penguin coaster beginner by on fisher s hook us terms stitches used ml magic loop materials = medium 4 weight yarn st s stitches white color 1 ~3g chain chain black color 2 ~4g slip_stitch slip_stitch orange color 3 <1g single_crochet single_crochet yellow color 4 < 5g half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 5mm h crochet hook double_crochet double_crochet scissors tc treble_crochet darning needle skip skip note ch3 will count as a stitch the wings and body are made in one continuous row row 4 to begin with color 1 create a magic loop ch3 will count as 1dc row 1 11dc into magic loop pull tight slip_stitch into the top of the beginning chain 3 to finish round 1 12 row 2 ch3 1dc in same st as chain 2dc in each remaining st insert hook to top of ch3 and slip_stitch change to color 2 to finish r2 24 penguin coaster beginner by on fisher s hook row 3 with color 2 ch3 1dc in the same st 1dc in the next st 2dc in the next st repeat 11 times 1dc in last st slip_stitch in top of ch3 to finish the row 36 row 4 1st wing ch4 2tc in the next st 2dc in the next st 1hdc in the next st 1sc in next st slip_stitch the next 4sts head 1sc in next st 1hdc in next st 2dc in the next st 2tc in the next 2sts 2dc in next st 1hdc in next st 1sc in next st 4slst in next 4sts 2nd wing 1 single_crochet in next st 1hdc in next st 2dc in next st 2tc in the next st 1tc in the next st 10 sts left unworked fasten_off and sew in ends penguin coaster beginner by on fisher s hook feet in the bottom 10 unworked sts attach color 3 into 4th st ch2 2hdc in the same st in the next st 2hdc and 1slst in next st 1slst then 2hdc 3hdc in the next st fasten_off and sew in ends beak thread color 4 through darning needle for beak placement use the two pairs of treble crochets in the head section as the center below those where the color 2 meets color 1 there should be 3 stitches thread color 4 from back to front across those three stitches to make two horizontal row then use the center stitch between those in row 2 as the point of a v and sew 4 vertical lines across the horizontal ones in a v shape knot in the back and sew in ends works best if you thread through the stitches instead of in between the stitches penguin coaster beginner by on fisher s hook on fisher s hook 2020 @onfishershook
